alert.note: Alert for Furnas; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Blowing Dust Advisory issued April 08 at 12:37PM CDT until April 08 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust. * WHERE...Gosper and Furnas Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This blowing dust is occurring in the vicinity of the wildfire that burned across parts of Gosper and northern Furnas Counties yesterday. Winds will gradually trend lower, but gusts of 30 MPH or higher remain possible through the afternoon. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive.
